name: IMPLANT_LEAD_USE_TYPE
description: This table contains information about the type of lead used for an implant.

columns.name: IMPLANT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the implant record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: IMPLANT_LD_USE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The type of lead, how this lead is used. Source: NICOR (UK) CRM.
